name: System_Corruption
description:
IMPORTANT: Sounds are very important! Use headphones or a decent sound system.

This game was created for Ludum Dare #42. The theme is "Running out of space".

Navigate through old-school-maze-like levels, find enough power cells to power up escape pads and outrun energy draining viruses.

I wanted to include some accessibility settings so it wouldn’t be %100 rely on the sounds but the social life happened. I’m planning to add them later most likely I won't though :( ...
